attributes.action: The TV licence should be abolished if BBC News coverage cannot remain unbiased.
attributes.background: BBC News reporting helps indulge propaganda. Two areas specifically come to mind - firstly BREXIT - so much unbalanced negative reporting.  This also happens on other news subject matters too. Palestinian/Israeli/Gaza conflicts where reporting is biased towards the Palestinians.  Just two examples.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. It is not clear who would be responsible for deciding that the BBC was not unbiased, or how they would decide this. 

You could start a new petition calling on the Government to create BBC bias guidelines, which, if broken, would then result in the abolishment of the TV license.
